mapper.select: SELECT C.*, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_STATUS, M.MEMBER_CLASS FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_COMPANY_MEMBER C ON C.ID = M.ID WHERE M.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_COMPANY_MEMBER CM JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON CM.ID = M.ID WHERE CM.ID IS NOT NULL
AND M.MEMBER_STATUS = #{status}
AND MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND CEIL(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(M.MEMBER_RECENT_LOGIN)) <= #{date} )

SELECT M.ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_CERTIFICATE_PATH, COMPANY_CULTURE, COMPANY_ESTABLISHMENT, COMPANY_EMPLOYEE, COMPANY_CEO, C.ID AS COMPANYID , COMPANY_INTRODUCE, COMPANY_LOGO_PATH, COMPANY_MAIN_ADDRESS, COMPANY_MEMBER_DEPARTMENT, COMPANY_MEMBER_POSITION, COMPANY_URL, COMPANY_WELFARE, MEMBER_PHONE, C.COMPANY_BUSINESS_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_RECENT_LOGIN, M.MEMBER_STATUS, M.CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_COMPANY_MEMBER CM ON CM.ID = M.ID JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON C.ID = CM.COMPANY_ID WHERE MEMBER_CLASS='기업' AND M.ID = #{id}
